title: fishbat CMO Jennifer Calise Reveals 4 Ways to Encourage Consumers to Share Your Content
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/26/2015 @ 6:19 AM   fishbat 
TRIBECA, N.Y., Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- fishbat is a leading social media agency based in Tribeca, N.Y. The company combines proven Internet marketing strategies that include SEO, digital ads, Web content and social media optimization (SMO) to help businesses increase profits and expand brand awareness. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151023/280102 
According to Jennifer Calise, chief marketing officer of fishbat, "making your business content on social media go viral isn't exactly an easy task. However, there are a few key things you can do to create the most shareable content that your customers and/or consumers will want to post on their own social media accounts". 
Here are a few tips on how to encourage consumers to share your content: 
1. Create great content 
People will be much more likely to share content that resonates with them, and provides a value to their friends and family members- for example a how-to video, a useful statistic, or a funny photo. Social media users will share things that they think their own network will enjoy. 
2. Use engaging marketing 
Many consumers will come to your site once and be done with it. So it is crucial to utilize email marketing and remarketing campaigns to get people back to your site to engage in your content. Include things like open-ended questions in your posts to initiate feedback and responses from your followers. 
3. Focus on value-added content 
Consumers typically don't like to be directly advertised to, so focus on sharing more valuable content. Rather than posting about the product or service your business is trying to advertise, post useful and entertaining content. For example, if your business provides plumbing services, post videos on how to fix common plumbing issues for everyday people. 
4. Make it easy to share with icons 
Posting great content is crucial, and providing your followers with the tools to easily share that content is the next step. Utilizing social sharing icons with your content can seriously increase the extent to which people share your posts. These icons make it super simple for users to share your content right away.
